thread.section_title: The Piccadilly London West End - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Wonderful hotel
thread.title_full: Wonderful hotel - Review of The Piccadilly London West End, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Docmatt
title: Wonderful hotel
text: Absolutely a great hotel to stay, friendly staff, who were most helpful. This trip was to celebrate my husbands 40th birthday, our room had balloons, cake, and chocolates on arrival, all my expectations were exceeded! We also received a free room upgrade! Would recommend to any traveller wanting a great location and warm comfortable stay, we will be back! Many thanks
